name: Influenza (Flu)
description: More severe viral respiratory illness than a cold, with sudden onset of high fever, body aches, fatigue, and respiratory symptoms.
approaches: Elderberry to reduce duration and severity
Diaphoretic herbs to support fever response
lifestyle: Allow fever to work (unless dangerously high)
whenToSeek: Difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain, confusion, severe vomiting, high-risk groups (elderly, pregnant, immunocompromised)
